post.body: I nominate @MariSmith for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia 'cuz she's fun, friendly and provides heaps of useful Facebook tips!
...that's probably how they make 'baby reindeers'. Hope you enjoyed listening to Chris Rea from iTunes :o)
Thks for suggesting adding Twitter landing page to blog - I've just changed mine too. http://budurl.com/zsxq
Just like you am learning a lot about Twitter with @BobTheTeacher http://budurl.com/42wd
Thks for the follow - looking forward to next session on Twitter later with @BobTheTeacher http://budurl.com/42wd
thanks for your twitter lessons today http://tinyurl.com/7qtwld
Hi Bob!
Hi Bob, I'm Scottish :o))
Thks for latest update on tweetdeck good to have spell check. Better hit the sack - this thing is addictive!
Have a listen on YouTube - http://tinyurl.com/8g2c4m - Great Song
OK, if you really want to know - Best Carol 'Silent Night' - but best Xmas song 'Driving Home for Christmas' by Chris Rea
Thanks for nice comments... I had a good coach called... Connie Ragen Green! Happy holidays to you and yours XX
getting ready for my free teleclass on Sat, 3 January where I'll teach others how to master the technology behind teleseminars.
Using the Law of Reciprocity in your online business? Or even in your everyday life - if not, you should http://budurl.com/7tje
is hoping everyone in the UK will send their used stamps on Christmas cards to great cause RSPB 'Save the Albatross' http://budurl.com/mwhr
thinks we may have to add more of our personality in our blogs to make the connection with your readers/visitors http://budurl.com/cwen
I've wasted 1,140 Seconds or 19 Minutes or 0.32 Hours or 0.01 Days with 38 Tweets on Twitter! http://tweetwasters.com
Yep! Ping.fm works - just updated facebook and twitter from there - will save a lot of time now and we like that...
This is a test to see if I have managed to crack the Ping.fm code
Listening to Christmas Carols from King's College Cambridge, UK - no one else can do it quite like this choir
